title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 167.9 - Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 167.9 - Records

State Regulations
(a) The agency
shall maintain appropriate and accurate administrative, financial and student
records, as well as any other records that may be required by the commissioner. The agency shall maintain the following records for each student enrolled: (1)
registration form; (2)
test data; (3)
attendance data; (4)
diagnosis of needs; (5)
prescription of activities; and
(6)
record of progress and
achievement. (b) The
agency shall submit required reports as prescribed by the
commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
167.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
